div.bibl: The Reform Advocate Vol. 37, Wk. of Mar. 13, 1909 Pp 119-120

body.p: Adolph Kraus of Chicago, president of the International B'nai B'rith organization, has left Berlin to begin a comprehensive official visit to the great Jewish Oder throughout Germany, Bohemia, Hungary, Austria, and France.

Distinguished attention has been accorded to him by the German B'nai B'rith which gave a banquet in his honor. It was attended by the president of 43 local organizations from all parts of the country.
